decision_conditions: The proposed development would, by reason of its height, bulk, mass and excessive depth, appear as an unacceptably dominant and visually intrusive feature detrimental to the character and appearance of the host property and visual amenity of the locality contrary to Policy DC61 of the LDF Core Strategy and Development Control Policies DPD.

Also the proposed loft conversion including the hip to gable roof conversion and rear dormer window would unbalance the appearance of the pair of semi-detached properties and appear as an unacceptably dominant and visually intrusive feature in the street scene and rear garden harmful to the appearance of the surrounding area, contrary to Policy DC61 of the LDF Core Strategy and Development Control Policies Development Plan Document, the Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document and Policy 7.4 of the London Plan.

The proposed single storey side extension would, by reason of its bulk and position close to the boundaries of the site, be an intrusive and unneighbourly development having an adverse effect on the streetscene contrary to Policy DC61 of the LDF Core Strategy and Development Control Policies DPD.

The proposed rear dormer window, by reason of its scale, bulk and mass would appear out of scale and character with the dwelling and materially harmful to the visual amenity of the surrounding area contrary to Policy DC61 of the LDF Core Strategy and Development Control Policies Development Plan Document, the Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document and Policy 7.4 of the London Plan.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: Consideration was given to seeking amendments, but given conflict with adopted planning policy, notification of intended refusal and the reason(s) for it was given the Agent by e-mail on 26/08/21.
description: Single Storey side extension, conversion of loft to habitable space to include a rear dormer with Juliette balcony, 5 front roof lights, conversion of roof from hip to gable end and porch to front elevation. Single Storey detached garage to rear to include demolition of existing rear garage
